title: Drawing, 1910
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
signed: Lower right in ink, below caption [noted in inscriptions]: Whitney Warren / 1910
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right below image: "The original sketch for the facade / of the Grand Central Terminal New York" followed by the signature with "f"/ and the date.
description: A front elevation of lower and upper story is shown, with staircase leading up to the main entrance at center.  Five bays, alternately of different sizes, are placed between the corner projections. Roof ornamentation suggested at upper center of upper story.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1910.
1910. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-13.
